name: Hungry Animals
summary:
Hungry Animals is all about feeding the starving animals. Your challenge is to give the right food to each animal by aiming shots through the field of bubbles. The animals are picky and will only accept their favourite food, anything else will make your score drop. When aiming, try and select bubbles of the same colour as the food before hitting the animal you are feeding.

The key to a high score is the aiming of your shots. Pull back and aim carefully, trying to select the right food, the right colour of the bubbles and power ups. To reach every animal, try a high or low shot, straight or arching. You have a limited number of shots so try and make each one count.

Hidden in the columns are the B-O-N-U-S letters. Collect them and all food items in the bubble field will delivered to the right animal.
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: 动作
  • 游玩人数: 单人
  • 官方网站: http://www.king.com/games/action-games/hungry-animals
